name: SCARYIST HOROR GAME EVER.exe
description:
-----SCARYIST HOROR GAME EVER.exe-----

Made in GBStudio

--------------------------------------------

I bought this weird Game Boy cartridge from a creepy guy at a yard sale. Then I realized I was in my own yard and I was just talking to a mirror. Either way this game is CREEPY play at own your risk.

-----Controls-----

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Z or K to interact

-----Credits-----
